org.biojava.bio.structure

Class AtomImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biojava.bio.structure.AtomImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Atom, PDBRecord

    public class AtomImpl
extends Object
implements Atom, Serializable, PDBRecord
    Implementation of an Atom of a PDB file. currently the coordinates of an atom are represented by a double[3] array.
    Since:
    1.4
    Version:
    %I% %G%
    Author:
    Andreas Prlic
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
